channel.title: Deploy Cloud One File Storage Security on Data Security with Trend Micro
channel.description: Recent content in Deploy Cloud One File Storage Security on Data Security with Trend Micro

item.title: Testing your Deployment
item.description: Generating your First Detection To test your deployment, you’ll need to generate a malware detection using the eicar file. Follow the instructions below. There is also a video demonstration if you prefer. Obtain the EICAR file: Temporarily disable your virus scanner, otherwise it will catch the eicar file and delete it. Go to the EICAR file page and download eicar_com.zip or any of the other versions of this file.
